title: Interdisciplinary Mathematical Modeling Curriculum for Sustainability Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics/statistics knowledge and understanding of sustainability concepts
context.additional_context: For current practitioners, combining smartphone-based learning activities with offline workshops held twice monthly

learning_goals: Cultivation of the ability to design mathematical modeling processes for solving real-world sustainability problems
Acquisition of the ability to propose resource management optimization solutions through interdisciplinary data analysis
Strengthening the capability to develop sustainability solutions through team-based problem-solving activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
